application-template.name: Yahoo Reader MapReduce
application-template.description:
Crawle for Yahoo that will run by yahoo result pages by specified search query. You need to specify the path to file which consists an search queries.
Author: Alexander Kozlov [alexssource@gmail.com]

property.description: Specify the path with query files
property.label: Query Filespath
property.name: queryFilesDirectory

property.description: Specify the path where results will be placed
property.label: Result pages path
property.name: outputDir

property.description: If you want to use proxy specify the proxy host
property.label: Proxy Host
property.name: proxyHost

property.description: If you want to use proxy specify the proxy port
property.label: Proxy Port
property.name: proxyPort
